		logAction (line 73)
	
 
	
	

Function to be called when an action that modifies data occurs, if  logging has been requested. If @old and @new are the same, then no  logging occurs.


Logs are in partial XML format (no root node), and representations given  in the @old and @new parameters are bzip2 compressed and stored as base64  encoded node values

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			


	
	

		void
		
			logAction
		
					(string $event, string $target, integer $id, string $old, string $new, [ $disposition = null])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$event: one of "insert", "update", "delete"			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$target: the name of the resource that gets acted upon (e.g.  "application", "person", etc., as specified by the datatype attribute of  iRestResource			
    • 
					
  • 
				integer
				$id: the id of the resource that gets modified			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$old: the representation of the resource before the modification			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$new: the representation of the resource after the modification			
    • 
					
  • 
				
				$disposition			
    •
